This game is absolutely timeless. I've been playing it since 1.6 first released. The fact that Global Offensive is free is mindboggling. It's easily the best iteration of the game. When I first saw that they implemented weapon skins, I scoffed, but then over time, I've seen the appeal of having a personalized set of weapons. At the time of writing I've yet to purchase any. I feel like it should have included some cool weapons as a "thank you for buying the game in the first place" instead of the stupid medal they give you.

 The personality of the playerbase is a bit... outdated at times, but there's ways to mute people and you can always leave if you're bothered. I've even been kicked from games for having an off day, and  that can be a mood killer too. It's a bit on the violent side for my taste but the gameplay loop is near perfect in my opinion.
Garbage game now too many hackers since it went free to play.  Guess I got to go to Valorant.

Cs é um jogo muito bom que tenho certeza que marcou a infancia de diversas pessoas assim como a minha, lado negativo apos o cs ficar free to play, ou seja de graça a quantidade de hack cresceu de forma exorbitante ainda mais se voce é um jogador sem Prime, facilmente voce encontra partida com hacks, onde tanto no seu time quanto no do inimigo tem hack, e isso estraga o game, no momento eu acredito que esse seja o ponto negativo, Hack, de resto uma maravilha. Maravilha.
